Curfew in Seattle starting at 5 p.m. Saturday and Sunday in response to downtown protests

White House and CDC remove coronavirus warnings about choirs in guidance for reopening houses of worship

Officials said there have long been concerns within the White House that there were too many restrictions on choirs. This move comes in spite the CDC's report of a "superspreader" event in Mount Vernon, Wash., that sickened dozens and killed two.
